Reviews.Title: “Basic and great location”

Reviews.Content: clean location staff incredibly friendly overall theme paris avoid downstairs facing streetthere bar front otherwise basic clean hotel stay tiny showers

Reviews.Title: “More like a hostel!”
Reviews.Author: tinkerbell_edi
Reviews.Content: care wifi reception night receptionist willing help interact location bit spooky girl travelling safe

Reviews.Title: “Small room but great location.”
Reviews.Author: Neha P
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 5 nights enjoyed staff extremely helpful friendly stayed floor expecting accounted reviews expected paris clean located little street hotel entrance directly opposite little cafe evening lot people outside cafe little noisy cafe plays live music close hear loud actually enjoyed people hotel located near grand boulevards metro station walking distance notre dame 20 minutes marais louvre lots nice restaraunts shops near travelling safe catch taxis hotel late night fine disappointed breakfast everyday croissant baguette cheese fine couple days plan staying explore breakfast options

Reviews.Title: “Emeraude Hotel D'Espagne”
Reviews.Author: pengachoosa
Reviews.Content: walked hotel greeted friendly desk staff checked quickly clerks recommendation eat dinner adequate private bathroom nice windows fresh air price base camp explore paris note night clerk bit grumpy care stay enjoyable time visit paris

Reviews.Title: “Loved it here”
Reviews.Author: Joy056
Reviews.Content: travelling daughter daughter law hotel excellent cafes shops handy underground lift broke day stairs soon fixed staff friendly helpful bathroom adequate price beds comfy cafe street below noise slept stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: brainless69
Reviews.Content: paris night 4th march looking stay hostel orginally realised costing paid lovely hotel hotel situated amazing location 25minute walk gare du nord station 10 minutes louvre litte city hotels main shopping boulevard single beds lcd tv shower bathroom guess fussy suite perfect short break plenty minutes walk hotel dont worry hungry thirsty definatly recommend hotel looking central stay affordable price

Reviews.Title: “A good choice for Paris”
Reviews.Author: pdnrn Posted by an OctopusTravel traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel tucked mews grands boulevards excellent connections metro lively loud aggressive standard reception friendly helpful staff competent english typical paris fashion downsides move bed window looked shaft little natural light ensuite spacious shampoos etc looked newly decorated spotless hotels stayed tis price range outward facing window

Reviews.Title: “Great location, very small rooms, noisy very early......”
Reviews.Author: mlindop
Reviews.Content: hotel clean location tiny shower bed barely double none mattered woken 630 hear everyones morning ablutions movements impossible sleep breakfast adequate wifi

Reviews.Title: “Decent budget choice in great location”
Reviews.Author: Onofrius
Reviews.Content: mentioned reviews terrific location quiet alley grands boulevards wellpresented hotel frinedly polite staff clean shouldnt double manager giving key informed offered breakfast decent nevertheless space bags suitcase simply ought single

Reviews.Title: “Nice location between the centreand gare du nord”
Reviews.Author: Travel_Princessa
Reviews.Content: located hidden street little hotel nice suprise ground floor larger bathroom clean comfortable basic comfortable nights location nice mins walk main street restaurants shops 1520 mins walk tot river seine louvre perfect location lovely hotel friendly owner trying trip memorable happy help staff intelligent attentive didnt leave waiting mins experience

Reviews.Title: “Good value, nice staff, but deceptively noisy back street"”
Reviews.Author: FrankPeer
Reviews.Content: impression check bit cold guy reception particularly friendly avoiding eye contact waiting hello staff friendly 3 days including italian born maid breakfast lady generously offered croissants butter morning breakfast served 7 10 307 smallish especially unnecessary armchair twin beds shower hot clean tv wall wifi available request password reception hotel singing bistro opposite street tables outside warm people noisy 3 morning sunday night window slightly stuffy provided earplugs share bistros happy mood wish bistro closed street noisy peoples chatter rubbish collection checking 1200 able leave bags dedicated lobby staff bag tag unique useful flight didnt leave late evening location near museum tube station 10 minute walk opera 15 forum des halles

Reviews.Title: “Perfect little hotel in centre of Paris”
Reviews.Author: madison5
Reviews.Content: ok mixed feelings hotel reading reviews fault staff moment entered hotel moment left hotel quiet alley hotels 5 minute walk nearest metro serves mainline routes easy main attractions paris 2030 minute walk la louve resturants shops close hotel staff plesant helpfull throughout visit speak english suitable size 2 people top floor difference dont bed harder im thats sleep noise cleaned everyday clean towels soaps provided bathroom ok size im pretty breakfast price included package otherwise pay 8euros peson worth 8euros bb worth hotel smell drains bathroom hotels fault maybe air freshner happily hotel pleased indeed

Reviews.Title: “not perfect, but great for the price”
Reviews.Author: mattabessett
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 4 nights july location pretty quiet alley hotels 1 block metro stop 25 minute walk louvre lots decent restaurants carrefour grocery store hotel bit shabby especially carpeting dimly lit hallways shower issue ac hot night bit uncomfortable fan helped aside price hotel paris looking budget stay fine

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel - easy walking to Louvre, Moulin Rouge, Tower”
Reviews.Author: Rescue1959
Reviews.Content: little hotel basic comfortable friendly helpful staff breakfasts easy 20 min walk louvre 30min montmartre moulin rouge hour easy walking river eiffel tower louvre park champs elysees arc de triomphe couple little grocery shops 100yds cheaper buy beer wine food pay exorbitant paris prices little bistro vert midi couple streets rue saint marc reasonable prices food try stuffed rabbit loin floor looking streetgreat little jazz bar corner lots bars eateries immediate metro corner
